skillTree.name: Blessed Blades of Morr
skillTree.description: The Agents of the Fellowhip of the Shroud wield silvered blades blessed by the priests of Morr to aid them in their fight against the Undead.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Blessings of Morr
skillTree.description: The Priests of Morr inspires their allies to understand the pitiable state of the Undead and invoke Morr's outrage at their presence.

effects.description:
Attrition: -50% casualties suffered from Vampiric territory attrition
	(all units in army)
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings

Leadership: +4 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Destroy Undead
skillTree.description: Dark rippling flames pour forth from the caster, smiting the Undead.

effects.description:
Hero capacity: -2 for Vampires
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.name: Eternal Rest
skillTree.description: The caster chants a solemn prayer over the corpse, ensuring the soul is sent to Morr's realm and making it immune to necromancy.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Raise dead cost: +100%
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Sleep of Death
skillTree.description: A calming prayer that causes enemies to slumber like the dead.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

Enemy leadership: -6
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Cornered Rat
skillTree.description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded"

Overcast spell: "Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Aspect of the Dread Knight"

Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Doom & Darkness Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Fate of Bjuna"
Overcast spell: "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "The Purple Sun of Xereus"
Overcast spell: "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Unit
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Immortality
backgroundSkills.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
